name: Conditioned
text: Take no athletics penalty from @armour@.

name: Contortionist
text: Learn any one of the following tricks: the splits and putting your feet behind your head; somersaulting; walking on your hands. With two copies of this, learn all three.

name: Dancer
text: You know any two dances and actually look pretty good doing them.

name: Free climber
text: When climbing or falling, treat it as though it were half as high.

name: Gymnast
text: If you aren't Restricted or in a choke point, add your athletics score to combat.

name: Jockey
text: Your steed gets +1 to AGI checks.

name: Mark athletic
text: Whenever you beat someone at a check involving this skill, you may Mark them aeoc. Take +1 to all checks against a Marked target except ones involving this skill. You may maintain one (additional) Mark at a time. Marks last indefinitely or until you cancel them (modifier).

name: Parkour
text: You can climb up to AGI+athletics metres without a check as part of your action. You can wall run twice as far as you can long jump, and you can wall jump twice as high as you can high jump.

name: Second wind
text: Negate the check penalty from 1 point of @fatigue@.

name: Skautahlaupari
text: Negate the penalty from fighting on ice or other slippery terrain.

name: Specialist
text: When you get this, pick two of climb, fire, run, and swim. Take +5 to athletics actions relating to the first and -5 to the second.

name: Sprint
text: If you have no @fatigue@, take +3 to physical checks ueor and take 1 @fatigue@ aeor.

name: Stubborn
text: You have +1 focus.

name: Warm up
text: Whenever you do an athletics action during crisis, get +1 athletics aeor ueoc.

name: Anbinden
text: On landing a melee hit and when not flanked, enter blade bind with the target for one round. While blade bound, you can't be intercepted from clashing with them, and the check is POW+fight symmetric, not AGI+fight. This is chainable.

name: Berserkergang
text: Enter berserkergang ueoc or until incapacitated. Berserkergang: Take -2 focus aeor, and all hits you inflict are @crits:crit@. This focus loss can cause you to faint and take @injury@.

name: Bloodlust
text: When you incapacitate anyone, take +1 fight ueoc to a maximum of +5, and recover 5 focus.

name: Disarm
text: Instead of inflicting damage with a melee clash, you knock the weapon from your opponent's hand and inflict @stunned@.

name: Fighting withdrawal
text: When attacked, move away from the opponent and bring them with you. Works even if you both attack each other.

name: Giant slayer
text: Negate up to 3 size classes for purposes of damage reduction when fighting larger opponents.

name: Lancer
text: When you close from ranged to melee while mounted, inflict a @crit@.

name: Leadership
text: A target ally gets +1 ueor. Multiple instances of this don't stack.

name: Mark fight
text: Whenever you beat someone at a check involving this skill, you may Mark them aeoc. Take +1 to all checks against a Marked target except ones involving this skill. You may maintain one (additional) Mark at a time. Marks last indefinitely or until you cancel them (modifier).

name: Masochist
text: Negate the check penalty from 1 point of @injury@.

name: Overwhelming
text: If a single hit inflicts at least 3/4 of a target's maximum focus (rounded up), it incapacitates them.

name: Reckless
text: Take -1 to any clashes, and the outcome is a @crit@, including for the opponent.

name: Taunt
text: When you defend an ally, intercept all opponents attacking her.

name: Trample
text: When you hit someone in combat, they become @stunned@.

name: Wind up
text: Take -3 to all physical. Next round, take +2 to all physical.

name: Calming
text: Your mount doesn't bolt when hit.

name: Chadoka
text: Once each morning, prepare a thermos of tea, counting as a +2 focus potion. You can take this multiple times and prepare additional doses. Unused doses expire in the morning.

name: Craftsman
text: Pick an item. Take +5 to crafting it and it takes half as long.

name: Gatherer
text: (move) Once per day while travelling, check MET+knowledge vs 20. On success, find and harvest phytos along the way.

name: Green thumb
text: When you plant anything, it produces twice as much harvest.

name: Intuitive
text: 1 time per session, you may ask the GM an out-of-character question. He shouldn't answer outright, but should give a good hint, advice, or Socratic counter-question.

name: Kinbakushi
text: The penalty to trying to escape your knots is that they can't try again and must be untied; and you get +5 to tying checks, including when you're the one tied up.

name: Linguist
text: You can either fluently speak any one additional language; or badly speak any two; or understand any three.

name: Lockpicking
text: Pick a lock, with a AGI+knowledge check if there's time pressure or a trap or something. Must have a lockpick or at least a bit of wire or something.

name: Mark knowledge
text: Whenever you beat someone at a check involving this skill, you may Mark them aeoc. Take +1 to all checks against a Marked target except ones involving this skill. You may maintain one (additional) Mark at a time. Marks last indefinitely or until you cancel them (modifier).

name: Masseur
text: Massage: check AGI+knowledge vs 15; on a pass, they recover 1 additional @Fatigue@ this long rest. Can only be used once per patient per long rest. Take +1 to @medical@ checks.

name: Medic
text: Revive: Remove @Incapacitated@ from a character. They do not recover anything else, and they can inflict no damage or debuffs ueoc. They can freely run away, cast spells, or use items. Take +1 to @medical@ checks.

name: Musician
text: You are good at singing and any two instruments of choice.

name: Proficiency
text: +5 to checks related to some non-adventurer task.

name: Propagator
text: (modifier) When harvesting phytos, instead of collecting the reagent, get a viable cutting.

name: Recipe book
text: Pick any potion. Take +5 to crafting it and it takes half as long.

name: Seductive
text: Check MAS+knowledge vs END+knowledge to get an NPC to do something they really don't want.

name: Splint
text: Splint: Target ally gains Splinted, which negates 1 point of @Injury@. When they lose focus or receive any @condition@, the splint breaks. Take +1 to @medical@ checks.

name: Streetwise
text: You know a guy who knows a guy.

name: Treat wrangler
text: You can tame feral animals to another stage at 40 Tame, Loyal, whence they will fight for you while uninjured and at full focus.

name: Whisperer
text: You can try to tame an animal with intervals of one day, not one week.

name: Adept
text: You may learn twice as many spells.

name: Artificer
text: Your magic sense detects inactive enchantments. Magical creatures don't count.

name: Combat caster
text: When fighting with spells, add your magic skill to your combat.

name: Daskalos
text: When teaching someone a spell, it takes half as long.

name: Epiphany
text: When you receive @Injury@, if you know fewer than $magic spells, learn one known by someone nearby, chosen at random. You don't need to know the person, but you do have to meet the spell's requirement. This only triggers once per day.

name: Focus energy
text: Take -5 ueor. Gain a +1 magic token aeor.

name: Gnostic
text: You may channel two blue spells at the same time. Any effects are maxed, not stacked (eg if one gives +3 vigilance and another gives +4, you get +4, not +7).

name: Illusionist
text: Your @veils:veil@ @persist:persists@ for up to one hour even after you stop channelling them. You may only sustain one such veil at a time.

name: Irongut
text: You may drink an additional potion per crisis without side effects.

name: Limit break
text: Take +5 magic ueor and 1 @mana shock@. This can be used outside crisis.

name: Manaburn
text: Trade in a +1 magic token for +3 ueor.

name: Mark magic
text: Whenever you beat someone at a check involving this skill or successfully cast a spell at them, you may Mark them aeoc. Take +1 to all checks against a Marked target except ones involving this skill. You may maintain one (additional) Mark at a time. Marks last indefinitely or until you cancel them (modifier).

name: Savant
text: Pick any spell; take +5 to cast it. This does not allow you to cast at a higher level. Whenever you cast it without needing this, you may pick another spell.

name: Subtlety
text: The magic signatures from your blue spells are hidden and require a MET+vigilance vs MAS+stealth check to detect.

name: Teleurgy
text: Your red spells take effect anywhere you can see. This doesn't give combt bonuses.

name: Trance
text: Enter trance ueoc or until incapacitated. Trance: Take -1 focus and +1 magic token aeor to a maximum of +5. Focus loss can cause you to become incapacitated.

name: Zen
text: You can cast even if immobile or your hands are bound. This doesn't let you cast if incapacitated or using a weapon.

name: Aim
text: You may apply headshots to sneak attacks.

name: Beautician
text: When an ally wears a disguise, you can apply makeup and treat any disguise checks as assisted. You can 'assist yourself' for +5 if you have time to apply makeup.

name: Careful
text: Take no stealth penalty from @armour@ or other worn items.

name: Earskritcher
text: Trained animals don't consider you hostile and won't attack you or raise the alarm unless provoked or ordered.

name: Forgettable
text: It is a sneak attack whenever you attack someone who is neither attacking nor defending.

name: Hunter
text: While travelling, you can hunt enough to cover half your food requirements.

name: Mark stealth
text: Whenever you beat someone at a check involving this skill, you may Mark them aeoc. Take +1 to all checks against a Marked target except ones involving this skill. You may maintain one (additional) Mark at a time. Marks last indefinitely or until you cancel them (modifier).

name: Master of disguise
text: With a MAS+stealth vs MET+vigilance check and the right outfit, you can convince a target that you are someone they haven't personally met.

name: Ninjutsu
text: When you land a successful sneak or hidden attack, you aren't revealed, although the victim can probably figure out they're under attack and so you can't make sneak attacks.

name: Nonchalant
text: When you fail a hide check, instead of being revealed, you lose focus as per a POW roll; however, you also leave a bit of evidence such as a footprint or bit of hair, which will be found later if you don't remove it with a successful hide check.

name: Pickpocket
text: When you pass a stealth check, instead of hiding or sneak attacking, take an item from the target that they aren't wearing. If they weren't holding it, you aren't revealed.

name: Shameless
text: You may hide any one @concealed@ item on your person such that it can't be found even by frisking.

name: Trap maker
text: You may make hidden traps as per the Traps page.

name: Ventriloquist
text: Project voice with a MAS+stealth vs MET+vigilance check, to give a false location and/or sound like someone else.

name: Botanist
text: Whenever you see a phyto, if you've seen the kera before, you recognise it.

name: Distraction shot
text: When shooting into melee, instead of hitting either character, count as assisting one: their attribute+weapon becomes min(attribute+weapon, you.MAS+you.ranged_weapon)+5.

name: Grenadier
text: When using an @indirect@ weapon from behind cover, opponents can't use ranged attacks without indirect against you.

name: Iaido
text: When engaging a hidden opponent, their stealth bonus is penalised by your vigilance to a minimum of 0.

name: Kite
text: (modifier) When mounted and attacking with range only, gain @suppress@ and any opponents who try to close take -5.

name: Lip reader
text: Check MET+vigilance vs 10 to read lips.

name: Mark vigilance
text: Whenever you beat someone at a check involving this skill, you may Mark them aeoc. Take +1 to all checks against a Marked target except ones involving this skill. You may maintain one (additional) Mark at a time. Marks last indefinitely or until you cancel them (modifier).

name: Marksman
text: During ranged engagements, add your vigilance to your combat, and you have @suppress@.

name: Overwatch
text: Increase the bonus for engaging from the high ground at range to +5.

name: Pattern recognition
text: On spotting (not triggering) any trap, automatically spot all traps by the same trap-maker within line of sight.

name: Pre-sight
text: Take +5 when engaging opponents who are in a choke point at range.

name: Quickshot
text: When fighting with a @loaded@ weapon, you may use an additional unit of ammunition for +1.

name: Scotopic
text: You have darkvision 10m: take no penalty from darkness.

name: Snipe
text: When shooting into melee, damage from friendly fire is capped at 4.

name: Tracker
text: Take +5 when following footprints, and you also learn whether your quarry has armour or fight styles.

name: Vanguard
text: When an ally would blunder into a trap and you would have passed the spot checkx, you shout a warning in time to save them.
